name: disks-api
description: API to manage disks collections using node and mysql

scripts.init-dev-db: docker cp starter/etc/my.cnf disks-mysql:/etc/ && docker cp starter/var/lib/mysql disks-mysql:/var/lib/ && docker restart disks-mysql
scripts.delete-dev-db: npm run stop-dev-db && docker rm -f disks-mysql

author: Andressa Sivolella <andressasivolella@gmail.com>
